{"id":672143193,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1648893347,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/672143193/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int mx = 0, curr = 0;\n        map<char, int> m;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++)\n        {\n            if(m.find(s[i]) != m.end())\n                curr = max(curr, m[s[i]] + 1);\n            \n            m[s[i]] = i;\n            mx = max(mx, i - curr + 1);\n        }\n        \n        return mx;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
